description.displayText: My husband and I initially hired Theodora to watch our 5 month old for the occasional date night, but after a few really great experiences we started using her more frequently. She has since become part of the family! She's dependable and always sends photos and videos to keep us updated on what they're up to. I totally trust her with our little guy and wouldn't hesitate to recommend her to anyone looking for babysitter or nanny!
description.originalText: My husband and I initially hired Theodora to watch our 5 month old for the occasional date night, but after a few really great experiences we started using her more frequently. She has since become part of the family! She's dependable and always sends photos and videos to keep us updated on what they're up to. I totally trust her with our little guy and wouldn't hesitate to recommend her to anyone looking for babysitter or nanny!

description.displayText: Theodora was the primary nanny for my, then, 9 year old daughter. I really appreciated her attentiveness and gentle care towards my daughter's needs. She has helped open up my daughter to new things and a newfound love for the outdoors. I trust Theodora a lot and would recommend her to anyone searching for an attentive, kind, caring, fun, adventurous nanny.
